title: help with cool retro logo hand drawing!
content:
Hi everybody,

I was referred to this site from a "font fan". I know this is a hand drawing, but maybe someone out there knows something! This vintage hand drawn RCA logo is the inspiration for our album cover. if anyone knows a similar font i can use to get close, I'll add the lightning bolt with our graphic artist. our name is  
" ristband " so the "R" and "A" need to be pretty exact.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/images%5B8)
\_3585.jpg]

here are other links:

this one's the best  
 [http://t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:G\_CdM8ipAvFNmM%3Ahttp://www.audiotube...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035951/http:/t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:G_CdM8ipAvFNmM%3Ahttp://www.audiotubes.com/logorca.jpg "http://t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:G\_CdM8ipAvFNmM%3Ahttp://www.audiotubes.com/logorca.jpg")

one more:  
 [http://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:RM28SxAv6rMDGM%3Ahttp://www.ominous-v...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035951/http:/t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:RM28SxAv6rMDGM%3Ahttp://www.ominous-valve.com/images/rcalogo.gif "http://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:RM28SxAv6rMDGM%3Ahttp://www.ominous-valve.com/images/rcalogo.gif")

you can reach me at

[gladtone@gmail.com](mailto:gladtone@gmail.com)

THANKS IF YOURE READING THIS!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018035951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/images%5B8)
\_5055.jpg]
author: gladtone
